name: Until the World Goes Cold
description:
Until the World Goes Cold is a survival game made over 12 days for the SOS jam. 

The goal is to survive long enough for the nearby lake to freeze over, revealing a secret! You can gather resources, upgrade your tools and try to stay warm by refuelling you shelter and upgrading your clothes.

Controls

WASD - Movement

Left click - Use current tool

Scroll wheel (or number keys) - Switch tool

E - Refuel shelter when nearby

ESC - Pause the game

We hope you enjoy the game, please feel free to leave any feedback in the comments!

Developed by a team of three, give them a follow!
